replace.sel: //do_if[@value='if not $testcheat? then (((not $target.maxshield) or ($target.shieldpercentage lt 20)) and ($target.hullpercentage lt 75) and not $target.assigneddock and (not $target.iscapitalship or $target.people.count)) else true']/@value

diff.replace: if not $testcheat? then (((not $target.maxshield) or ($target.shieldpercentage lt 20)) and ($target.hullpercentage lt 75) and not $target.dock and (not $target.iscapitalship or $target.people.count)) else true
